doc:
Teri Hatcher https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teri_Hatcher 0 Teri Lynn Hatcher (born December 8, 1964) is an American actress, voice-actress, writer, singer, YouTuber, and former National Football League cheerleader. She is best known as Lois Lane on the television series Lois Clark: The New Adventures of Superman (1993–97), as Paris Carver in the James Bond film Tomorrow Never Dies, and as Susan Mayer on the television series Desperate Housewives (2004–12), for which she won the Golden Globe Award for Best Actress in a Musical or Comedy, three Screen Actors Guild Awards, and a Primetime Emmy nomination for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series. Teri_Lynn_Hatcher ( born December_8_,_1964 ) is an_American_actress , voice-actress , writer , singer , YouTuber , and former_National_Football_League_cheerleader . She is_best_known as Lois_Lane on the_television_series_Lois_ : The_New_Adventures of Superman_(_1993 – 97_) , as Paris_Carver in the_James_Bond_film_Tomorrow Never Dies , and as Susan_Mayer on the_television_series_Desperate_Housewives ( 2004 – 12_) , for which she won the_Golden_Globe_Award for_Best_Actress in a_Musical_or_Comedy , three_Screen_Actors_Guild_Awards , and a_Primetime_Emmy_nomination for Outstanding_Lead_Actress in a_Comedy_Series .
